author: Garrey Dawson
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. In a bowl, mix together half of the cheese, the breadcrumbs and parsley and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Pile the mixture into the hollowed-out tomato. Top with the remaining cheese and drizzle with olive oil.  Place onto a baking tray and bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbling and starting to turn golden-brown. Serve.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz Gouda cheese, grated,  25g/1oz fresh white breadcrumbs,  2 tbsp chopped fresh flatleaf parsley,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  ½ beef tomato, seeds removed,  1 tbsp olive oil
